subject: College Athletics
Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
Football (College)
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: The estate of the former Penn State coach Joe Paterno and several university trustees and former players are planning to sue the N.C.A.A. over the landmark penalties levied against the university.
snippet: The estate of the former Penn State coach Joe Paterno and several university trustees and former players are planning to sue the N.C.A.A. over the landmark penalties levied against the university.
